thread.title: Former Liverpool striker Djibril Cisse arrested, questioned in sex-tape blackmail case
thread.title_full: Former Liverpool striker Djibril Cisse arrested, questioned in sex-tape blackmail case

author: Kirstie Chiappelli
title: Former Liverpool striker Djibril Cisse arrested, questioned in sex-tape blackmail case
text:
Former Liverpool striker Djibril Cisse arrested, questioned in sex-tape blackmail case Sporting News 9 hrs ago Kirstie Chiappelli Â© Getty Former Liverpool and France striker Djibril Cisse was one of four people arrested and questioned Tuesday in Versailles as part of an investigation into an alleged blackmail attempt over a sex tape.
AdChoices According to Agence France-Presse , Cisse was taken into police custody as a person of interest because he knew the others involved, but was later released without being charged. The other three individuals remained in custody.
MORE: Sex scandals and sports
Police are investigating whether there was an attempt to blackmail France international player Mathieu Valbuena over video footage of sex acts that purportedly had been recorded on a mobile phone. The tape has not yet been proven to exist. Cisse initially was accused of conspiracy to blackmail, which is punishable by up to five years in prison in France, according to The Associated Press.
Cisse and Valbuena played together at Marseille from 2006 to 2009 and were part of the French squad for the 2010 World Cup. Cisse issued a complaint in 2008 alleging he was the victim of a blackmail threat involving a sex tape.
